snippet: Olivier Hanlan set an Atlantic Coast Conference tournament record for freshmen with 41 points, and Boston College beat Georgia Tech, 84-64.
abstract: College Basketball Roundup; UCLA defeats Arizona State, 80-75, in quarterfinals of Pacific-12 men's basketball tournament; other college basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Olivier Hanlan set an Atlantic Coast Conference tournament record for freshmen with 41 points, and Boston College beat Georgia Tech, 84-64.

headline.seo: Boston College Freshman Sets Record in Victory
headline.main: Boston College Freshman Sets Record in Victory
headline.print_headline: U.C.L.A. Needs Rally To Get Past Arizona St.
